extends java.lang.Object
implements opennlp.model.EventCollector, ArffGen
    Handler for creating training and test data sets for machine learning tools. User: Timo Homburg Date: 30.11.13 Time: 17:45 To change this template use File | Settings | File Templates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArffHandler

        public ArffHandler(java.lang.String filepath,
           java.lang.String boundarypath,
           Options option,
           Options trainOrTest,
           FeatureSets feature,
           DictHandling dicthandler,
           CharTypes chartype)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Handler for handling the generation of TestSets and TrainingSets given a specified feature set.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the file to create a testset/trainingset from
        boundarypath - file including the correct resolution for the given file
        option - Indicates if mallet or arff files should be produced
        trainOrTest - indicates if a training or testing file should be produced
        feature - the feature set to be used
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Writes the header for an arff file including the correct number of attributes. Attributes are simply named as att(Counter)
        Parameters:
